Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-23919 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 16.19.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-23919 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 16.19.1-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 16.19.1-1, affected by CVE-2023-23919
